name: RandomConversation
0:
”Alexa, start random conversation”
”Alexa, open random conversation”
”Alexa, stop”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: random conversation
des:
Use this skill to repel thieves who will think there's someone in house but actually there's no one in house. It's alexa who is playing random conversations for you.

To start, just say Alexa, start Random Conversation
and it'll start audio of around 60-70 mins for you while you go out.

In meantime if someone's trying to get in your house, they will return without attempting as this skill will make them believe someone's in house already.

For any kind of issue/suggestions, write us at alexa@hauper.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
